text: lol, I also love how they (and Orange Theory for that matter) also use orange as their primary color :joy:
That's right, Orange Theory is pretty similar too. Some serious sprocket love going on.
I know this isn’t <#CCBKMRACF|music>, but the fact that I’m not aware of a HubSpot-produced Elton John parody song titled “Sprocket Man” makes me really sad.

hi guys, i have a big question and i need some help here:
we are prospecting a company that want to migrate all their blog to HubSpot but not the full website AND they dont want to change their URLs (for SEO obviously) so they want:
• <http://mainsite.com|mainsite.com> ← actual custom made cms
• <http://mainsite.com/blog|mainsite.com/blog> ← HubSpot cms
is this posible? if yes, where i can read more about that?
